OOC: Sorry, I wrote my previous version of this post on my phone at
lunch, and it did not come out quite right. It did not parse the
punctuation correctly, and I missed a few things. 

Here is a corrected post (I added a little)

BIC:

Deepstryke nodded. �Good then there is little need for a history
lesson.� He glanced up for a second as he received some sort of
communication on his internal mikes. Quickly he tapped out a reply and
sent it off. 

Deepstryke looked critically at Nightstrike and Darkfate for a moment
and then glanced at the others as if coming to a decision.

�MINIONS TRANSFORM!� 

With a thrust of power Deepstryke and then the others leapt into the
air, becoming a military satellite and three star fighters.

�It is time to take the matrix, or destroy it, by order of CYCLONUS!�

Assuming that Nightstrike and Darkfate follow suit, Deepstryke leads
his group in the direction of the ark!

(OOC: I cannot speak for Airly�s characters, but none of mine here in
this group have any sort of stealth, although they are taking
reasonable precautions to avoid immediate detection)

Preston
(Da�minion)


> xochitla2006 wrote: 
> >             Nightstrike; 
> > "currently the ark must be in Month St. Helen and the matrix of 
> > leadership in Optimus Prime's chest if he awakes today, he would be
> 
> > Autobots leader; ark contains also some decepticons warrios and 
> > Megatron. when optimus die, hot rod will get Autobot's leader ship 
> > matrix. " 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups. com , Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@
> ...> 
> > wrote: 
> >> 
> >> Nightstrike/ Darkfate: 
> >> > "Yes sir" said Nightstrike and both males followed 
> >> >Decibel 
> >> 
> >> 
> >> Decibel leads Nightstrike and Darkfate a few hundred yards inward
> to 
> >> the highest peak on the mountaiike;n top. As they walk Tumult has 
> > been 
> >> speaking into his radio, his voice much too low to be understood. 
> >> 
> >> Before long they came out into a clearing, and before them stands
> a 
> >> female minion looking at some device and a much larger mech that 
> > could 
> >> only be Deepstryke. 
> >> 
> >> The female is predominantly crimson red with ebony black at her 
> >> shoulders and hips. She is obviously a jet in her alt mode, as her
> 
> >> slender midriff bore the distinctive outline of a nosecone. Her
> face 
> >> and forearms are alabaster white, with fin like protrusions of the
> 
> > same 
> >> hue flowing off of her helm. 
> >> 
> >> She looked up at the duo as they entered, locking gazes with 
> >> Nightstrike and Darkfate. Her demeanor was curious and yet
> strangely 
> >> aggressive, her humorless smile she displayed only accentuated
> this. 
> >> Her optics were deep and penetrating as she stared at them, her
> head 
> >> tilting slightly. For a moment it was as if she saw not just them,
> 
> > but 
> >> something more, something only she could see about them. But then 
> > the 
> >> moment passed as her smile faded and she returned to looking at
> the 
> >> device she had been studying before they came up. 
> >> 
> >> The other figure that stood here was truly massive. He stood
> nearly 
> >> head and shoulders taller then most mechs, with huge shoulders,
> and 
> >> powerful limbs. He was colored primarily in gunmetal grey armor, 
> > with 
> >> red at his large shoulders, and splashes of it at his faceplate.
> He 
> >> looked something like a seeker on steroids! He had what appeared
> to 
> > be 
> >> a nosecone at his chest, but his frame was far more thickly
> armored 
> >> then any seeker. Cannons were mounted on his back, as well
> extending 
> >> from his shoulders extending along each bicep, while on his chest 
> >> appeared to be rocket or missile launchers. 
> >> 
> >> He turned to look at the female next to him, his face dour and
> hard, 
> >> "Phobia, you have the information yet?" 
> >> 
> >> The red and black femme next to him snapped alert and looked 
> > over, "Yes 
> >> sir, I have something." She glanced back at her device and then 
> > back at 
> >> Deepstryke, "It has taken some time to make sense of the neural 
> > upload 
> >> Nightrazor sent us of Hot Rod, but I do believe we have a location
> 
> > of 
> >> what they're looking for." 
> >> 
> >> Deepstryke nodded, "Does it match the original location Cyclonus 
> > sent 
> >> us?" 
> >> 
> >> Phobia nodded as Deepstryke's head snapped around to look at 
> >> Nightstrike and darkfate, his look long and penatrating, "What do 
> > you 
> >> know of the original Ark the fell to earth, and of the Optimus
> Prime 
> >> that held the matrix?" 
> >> 
> >> Preston 
> >> (Da'minion)
